item.content:encoded: Image: The Arcane Library Eat The Reich, a game about vampires hunting Hitler, also takes home gold The Shadowdark tabletop role-playing game won the top prize in this year‚Äôs Ennie Awards. And that‚Äôs not all! A panel of experts gave the old-school-inspired RPG three other gold medals as well, including Best Game, Best Layout and Design, and even Best Rules. That gives creator Kelsey Dionne and her team at The Arcane Library about as clean a sweep you can get in Gen Con‚Äôs biggest awards program...

item.description: Image: Firewalk Studios/Sony Interactive Entertainment In a sea of free competitors, how will Concord not only stand out, but survive? Sony and Firewalk Studios‚Äô Concord launches on PlayStation 5 an...
item.content:encoded: Image: Firewalk Studios/Sony Interactive Entertainment In a sea of free competitors, how will Concord not only stand out, but survive? Sony and Firewalk Studios‚Äô Concord launches on PlayStation 5 and PC later this month, and faces an uphill battle to success. The team-based hero shooter is, unlike much of its competition, a ‚Äúpremium‚Äù paid title ‚Äî meaning it‚Äôs not free to play like rival shooters Overwatch 2, Apex Legends, and Tom Clancy‚Äôs XDefiant. item.content:encoded: Riot‚Äôs tactical 5v5 shooter is now free for all Riot Games‚Äô tactical competitive first-person shooter Valorant is now officially live on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X, the developer announced Friday. Like the existing PC version of the game, Valorant is free to play on consoles. The console release of Valorant is currently available to players in the United States and Canada, Europe, Japan, and Brazil. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve received so much valuable feedback from players during Limited Beta, and feel confid...

item.content:encoded: Image: Corpse Grinder & TI/Nintendo ROMhacking.net‚Äôs data is moving over to the Internet Archive ROMhacking.net, a longtime resource for video game fan translations and homegrown fixes for classic games, is shutting down operations, the site‚Äôs administrator said Thursday. The site‚Äôs database, including all files and images, have been transferred to the Internet Archive for preservation. The ROMhacking.net website is a rich resource for post-release hacks and patches for software, particularly ...

item.content:encoded: Photo by PETER CZIBORRA/POOL/AFP via Getty Images Did Assassin‚Äôs Creed really help restore the cathedral? item.content:encoded: Image: Unbroken Studios/Warner Bros. Games The quidditch video game will be a PlayStation Plus freebie One of the more notable missing elements from the Harry Potter prequel game Hogwarts Legacy was the high-flying sport of quidditch. Publisher Warner Bros. Games will address that exclusion later this year with Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions, a new single-player and online competitive multiplayer game based on the wizarding sport. Developer Unbroken Games revealed the first gameplay from it...
